course.subject: ECON
course.name: Advanced Industrial Organization
course.description: The course will analyze the main tools and models in modern Industrial Organization. Topics to be covered include the mathematics of supermodularity, mechanism design and auction theory, static models of oligopoly, dynamic models of oligopoly, dynamic models of entry and exit, imperfect competition and nonlinear prices.
course.prerequisites: ECON 5120 AND ECON 5220
